subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick beat Novak Djokovic, 6-3, 6-2, and will face Rafael Nadal in the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open at Indian Wells, Calif. Nadal beat Juan Martín del Potro, 6-2, 6-4. Vera Zvonareva advanced to the women’s final, where she will face Ana Ivanovic. tennis.
